name: frontend-tribe-single-page-dev-portfolio-resource-bundle
description: Single-page developer portfolio project with Babel setup.

scripts.build: npm run clean && babel starter-template/src -d dist --presets=@babel/env --plugins=@babel/plugin-bugfix-safari-id-destructuring-collision-in-function-expression
scripts.deploy: echo 'Deployment command goes here (e.g., netlify deploy, firebase deploy)'
